name: agent-analytics-backend
description: Backend analytics platform for agentic AI applications

scripts.dev: npm run build:frontend && npm run dev:backend
scripts.dev:full: npm run build:frontend && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd src/agent_analytics/client && npm run dev && cd ../../../
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd src/agent_analytics/client && npm run build && cd ../../../
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:platform && npm run test:extensions
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.setup: uv sync && npm install && cd src/agent_analytics/client && npm install && cd ../../../
scripts.setup:dev: uv sync --extra dev && npm install && cd src/agent_analytics/client && npm install && cd ../../../
scripts.setup:extensions: uv sync --extra dev --extra extensions && npm install && cd src/agent_analytics/client && npm install && cd ../../../
